fields.text: Welcome to Virtusa South Bay, your IT recruiting agency delivering digital transformation expertise to Global 2000 companies.
If you are a job seeker seeking IT and digital transformation roles, press [INDEX].
To submit your resume and create a candidate profile, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a recruitment specialist for resume submission.
To speak directly with a recruiter about current job openings, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to a recruiter for job opportunity discussions.
If you are a client seeking support or project services, press [INDEX].
For account support and service issues, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to your account service representative.
To discuss a new digital transformation or IT outsourcing project, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our solutions consultant for new project inquiries.
